attributes.action: To find a diplomatic solution to the problems Saudi Arabia has in dealing with non muslim British workers in Saudi Society
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Non Muslims suffer hardship,Christians are not allowed to worship or meet for bible study.
The problem is that Saudi, as the keeper of 2 holy sites at Mecca & Medina, feels it has to be harsh to defend Islam but Mohammed founded a "religion of Peace" so with diplomatic relations our country should request the Saudi authorities to honour that peacefull religion & respect others Faith"s.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
